advancements.underfabric.ruins_mouse.des: Knowing the mouse might one day leave its hole and get the cheese... It fills you with determination

advancements.underfabric.spider_sale.des: Made by spiders, for spiders, of spiders!
advancements.underfabric.start.descripti: It's the first of many beginnings, the story belongs to you
advancements.underfabric.ribbon.descript: Because wearing a cute bow on your head sure does defend you from literal magic spells that kill you, yes
